---
title: "soil distribution from both viewpoints"
author: "fabian gruber"
date: "October 3, 2017"
output: html_document
---
```{r,include=F}
library(knitr)
load("/home/fabs/PROJECTP2/data2017/boden_SGU.RData")
boden_SGU <- boden_SGU[boden_SGU$KLASSE != "",]
boden_SGU <- boden_SGU[boden_SGU$TYP != "",]
boden_SGU <- boden_SGU[boden_SGU$SUBTYP != "",]
boden_SGU <- droplevels(boden_SGU)
```



```{r,echo=FALSE}
kable(as.data.frame.matrix(table(boden_SGU$TYP,boden_SGU$SGU_gk)),caption="Distribution of the soil typ classes on the SGUs of the geological map")
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
kable(as.data.frame.matrix(table(boden_SGU$TYP,boden_SGU$SGU_kartiert)),caption="Distribution of the soil typ classes on the SGUs as interpreted by the surveyor")
```
